title: Workshop on Improving Elementary Mathematics Education Using Concrete-to-Abstract Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational awareness of educational settings
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen mathematics instruction competencies.

learning_goals: Explain the step-by-step application principles of the concrete-to-abstract instructional method and apply them to actual lesson design
Propose at least three types of manipulatives and digital tools that enhance learners' conceptual understanding in geometry and algebra
Share developed instructional models through project-based assessments with peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
